title: 'Fire of the century' for Corfu as some locals suspect arsonists behind blazes
description: I'm standing watching a helicopter scoop water out of the Ionian Sea and dump it onto flames being blown down the steep slopes of northeast Corfu towards a school and villas below.

title: 'I have nothing left': Rhodes stable owner picks up the pieces after wildfire destroys livelihood
Trump's US presidential rival Ron DeSantis involved in car crash
description: US presidential hopeful Ron DeSantis has been involved in a car crash.

title: British family fleeing Rhodes face nightmare 'towering inferno compared with Titanic'
description: A British holidaymaker has described the nightmare scenario he faced as he fled wildfire-ravaged Rhodes with his wife and two young children.

title: China's outspoken foreign minister removed from office
description: China's outspoken foreign minister - who has not been seen publicly for a month - has been removed from office and replaced by his predecessor.

title: Will extreme weather change our summer holidays forever?
description: Wildfires on the Greek islands of Rhodes and Corfu have seen hundreds of British holidaymakers evacuated.

title: BBC admits asking 'inappropriate' question to player at Women's World Cup
description: The BBC has admitted asking an "inappropriate" question about sexuality to the Moroccan captain at the Women's World Cup.

title: Thousands of Britons flown from Rhodes to UK - as new evacuation order issued on island
description: Thousands of Britons have been flown back from Rhodes - with new estimates suggesting 10% of land on the Greek island has been burned by wildfires.

title: Crypto scheme that scans people's eyeballs being looked at by UK regulator
description: The UK data watchdog is looking into a cryptocurrency scheme launched by OpenAI boss Sam Altman that offers digital coins in exchange for eyeball scans.

title: What is the Fire Weather Index and how does it work?
description: Thousands of tourists have had to escape to safety as huge wildfires continue to rage on the Greek islands of Rhodes and Corfu.

title: Woman and parents arrested after headless body found in hotel bathtub
description: A woman and her parents have been arrested after a headless body was discovered in a hotel bathtub in Japan.

title: Six guilty over Brussels airport and train attack that killed 32
description: Six men have been found guilty of murder over the 2016 Brussels terror attacks that left 32 people dead.

title: Woman whose kidnapping sparked nationwide search admits she wasn't abducted
description: A woman has admitted that she lied about being kidnapped in Alabama.

title: Oppenheimer sex scene featuring sacred Hindu text sparks outrage in India
description: A sex scene in box office smash hit Oppenheimer has sparked outrage in India with social media users threatening to boycott the nuclear arms biopic.
